job.title: Product Manager
job.description: Our mobile and internet app has completely the modernized the costly and timeconsuming century old automobile fuel supply chain in allowing the average person office park or any fleet of vehicles to conveniently refuel without having to move a muscleltbrgtltbrgtWith nearly 90MM in funding and 180k daily revenue Our customers span from the automotive industry with Mercedes Benz to the consumer goods industry with Walmart With our massive market cap we are rapidly scaling to meet demand and looking to add a Staff Software Engineer to assist on Delivery Product strategy and roadmap based on users insights and provide new concepts and work flows to increase safety and efficiencyltbrgtltbrgtWe are looking to add top of the industry talent to our team and with your experience it could be an ideal fit let me know if youre interested in a discussion about itltbrgtltbrgtWhat You Will Be DoingltbrgtltbrgtWork with design and engineering team to solve any and all problemsltbrgtltbrgtWork on product initiatives to improve customer experienceltbrgtltbrgtWhat You Need for this Positionltbrgtltulgtltligt A minimum of 4 years of experience working with b2b or Saas softwareltligtltligt Experience building a product from start to finishltligtltligt Experience working with a software engineering teamltbrgtltligtltulgtSo if you are a Product Manager with experience please apply todayltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtEmail Your Resume In Word ToltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsoltbrgtltbrgtNituGulatiPaulyCyberCoderscomltbrgtltulgtltligtPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  LP81623284  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredltbrgtltligtltulgtNitu GulatiPauly  VP of Recruiting  CyberCodersltbrgtltbrgtApplicants must be authorized to work in the USltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtYour Right to Workltstronggt  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire
